snippet: Diamond said it would replace its chief executive and chief financial officer after its board found the company booked payments to walnut growers in the wrong periods.
abstract: Diamond Foods says it will restate earnings for the last two years and replace its top two executives after the board found the company had booked payments to walnut growers in the wrong periods; company's shares plunge.
lead_paragraph: Diamond said it would replace its chief executive and chief financial officer after its board found the company booked payments to walnut growers in the wrong periods.

headline.seo: Diamond Foods to Restate Earnings and Replace Executives
headline.main: Diamond Foods Will Restate Its Earnings
headline.print_headline: Food Maker Diamond Will Restate Its Earnings
